Text:

it downloaded nice and fast but when I double clicked to start it, it didn't work and my computer bleeped twice to tell me that this game doesn't work.
It's a DOS game. NOT a windows game. Use Dosbox.
Thanks, I really needed the original doom files, not modified for windoze.
